title: Danio's Prelude
description: Hear Danio's story, told by the people who know him best. The ones who knew him when all of his laughter was genuine. The ones who were there through the worst that life could throw at him. And the ones who stayed by his side while he picked up the pieces.An adult, short story collection, based on the Young Adult series, More than Magic.Contains strong language, violence, and sex.
author: Elizabeth Kirke
